text: We’re in the market for a HubSpot Dev.  We have the configuration and workflow side taken care of in house but need some help as needed for quick custom code workflows.  Please DM me if interested.  Ideally we find a developer that we can access through a service like <http://upwork.com|upwork.com>
<@U03UHHCESFR> i’m interested and sent you a DM
